Package it.uninsubria.client.controller.homepage.categories

Class CategoriesController

java.lang.Object
it.uninsubria.client.controller.ControllerBase
it.uninsubria.client.controller.homepage.categories.CategoriesController
All Implemented Interfaces:
LanguageManager.LanguageChangeListener, ParametrizedController, javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class CategoriesController extends ControllerBase implements javafx.fxml.Initializable, ParametrizedController
Controller for the categories view that displays book categories in a grid layout. Handles category loading, filtering, and navigation to category detail views.

This controller manages the main categories interface, including:

  • Loading and displaying book categories
  • Search and filter functionality
  • Navigation to detailed category views
  • Performance optimization with caching and pagination

1.0

    • loadCategories

      private void loadCategories()
      Loads book categories from the server and populates the UI. Uses caching to avoid unnecessary network requests. Categories are loaded asynchronously to prevent UI blocking.

    • refreshCategories

      public void refreshCategories()
      Forces a refresh of the categories data from the server. Bypasses the cache and reloads all categories. Typically called when the user explicitly requests a refresh.
